ecosystem.title: Complete Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Four powerful tools, one unified platform
ecosystem.description: SyntropySoft provides a complete solution for modern Node.js applications, from observability to frontend and security.

tools.name: SyntroJS
tools.title: Backend Framework
tools.description: FastAPI for Node.js. Build high-performance APIs that run on Node.js and Bun without changing any code. Automatic validation and generated documentation.

tools.name: SyntropyLog
tools.title: Observability Framework
tools.description: From chaos to clarity. Distributed tracing, automatic correlation, and zero-boilerplate logging for high-performance teams.

tools.name: SyntropyFront
tools.title: Frontend Framework
tools.description: Modern frontend development with seamless integration to the SyntropySoft ecosystem.

tools.name: Praetorian
tools.title: Security & Governance
tools.description: Enterprise-grade security and governance for your Node.js applications.

sintrojs.title: SyntroJS ‚ö° ‚Äì FastAPI for Node.js & Bun
sintrojs.subtitle: The world's first dual-runtime framework. Write once, run on Node.js and Bun with maximum performance. Zero code changes.
sintrojs.description: SyntroJS is the only framework that works on Node.js AND Bun without changing absolutely any code. Get automatic validation, generated documentation, and exceptional performance on both runtimes.

dual_runtime.title: Dual Runtime
dual_runtime.description: Same code runs on Node.js and Bun. Zero code changes, maximum performance.

fastapi_dx.title: FastAPI-like DX
fastapi_dx.description: Automatic validation, type safety, and interactive docs. Best developer experience for Node.js.

testing.title: Testing Is Simple
testing.description: TinyTest makes writing tests as easy as creating endpoints. Mutation testing in seconds.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: 3.8x faster than Fastify with Bun. 89.3% of Fastify's performance with Node.js.

interactive_docs.title: Interactive Documentation
interactive_docs.description: Automatic Swagger UI and ReDoc generation. Documentation that writes itself.

syntropylog.title: SyntropyLog üîç ‚Äì From Chaos to Clarity
syntropylog.subtitle: The observability framework for high-performance teams. Build resilient, secure, and efficient Node.js applications with confidence.
syntropylog.observability_tooltip: The ability of a system to be understood from the outside through its outputs: logs, metrics, and traces.
syntropylog.feature_desc: SyntropyLog is not just a logger. It's a complete observability system that gives you the power to deeply understand your application, with production-ready features.

features.title: Zero Performance Overhead
features.description: Logs in 2ms (same as Pino, the fastest in the market) with 0 performance impact.

features.title: Minimal Bundle Size
features.description: Only 203 bytes larger than Pino (1.03x) - intelligent tree-shaking that only loads what you use.

features.title: Zero Boilerplate
features.description: Get started in 30 seconds with automatic context propagation across services.

features.title: Automatic Distributed Tracing
features.description: Correlation IDs that travel between services, HTTP calls, and message brokers without configuration.

features.title: Intelligent Singleton Pattern
features.description: Prevents pod crashes in Kubernetes with efficient resource management.

features.title: Testing Revolution
features.description: SyntropyLogMock eliminates the need for real connections in tests - 88.93% test coverage.

features.title: Enterprise Security
features.description: GitHub Dependabot, CodeQL, automated vulnerability scanning - 100% open source.

about.title: Built by Developers, for Developers
about.subtitle: At SyntropySoft, our passion is solving real problems. We are a team dedicated to creating high-quality software with a strong commitment to open source and the community.

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.subtitle: Have an idea, need a custom solution, or just want to know more? Send us a message.

quickStart.title: Get started in 30 seconds
quickStart.subtitle: Install and start logging with zero configuration

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: Thanks to those who make this project possible
sponsors.description: SyntropyLog is possible thanks to the support of our community and sponsors.
